definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Pure nickel silk with steady potential in KOH solution could be used as reference electrode.
sentences.chinese: 鎳作參比電極在氫氧化鉀溶液中的電極電勢穩定。

sentences.english: Some carbons are activated or washed with phosphoric acid, zinc chloride, or potassium hydroxide.
sentences.chinese: 一些碳被激活或磷酸，氯化鋅或氫氧化鉀，洗淨。

sentences.english: Niobium acid was synthesized by potassium hydroxide melting method using different inorganic acid treatment and its properties were characterized by FF-IR, TG and UV-VIS spectra.
sentences.chinese: 採用氫氧化鉀熔融法以不同無機酸處理合成了鈮酸。

sentences.english: Zinc anode is corroded by electrolytic KOH solution during storage, and then hydrogen gas is evolved.
sentences.chinese: 蓄電時鋅陽極會被氫氧化鉀電解液腐蝕，並放出氫氣。

sentences.english: The potassium hydroxide electrolyte is forced into the cells just before use.
sentences.chinese: 在開始使用前把氫氧化鉀電介質壓入蓄電池。
